					<div id="bottom-padding"></div>
			    </div>
		    </div>
		    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="device-info-tab">
		    	<div class="container">
			    	<div class="row">
			    		<div class="col-md-6">
							<div class="panel panel-primary">
								<div class="panel-heading">
									<h3 class="panel-title">General Information</h3>
								</div>
								<!-- GENERAL INFORMATION -->
							</div>

							<div class="panel panel-primary" id="game-info-panel">

			</div>
